title: 'Boys and Girl - McVay vs. Garrett; The Chemistry Issue; Week 15 Rams Preview with NFL Network's Omar Ruiz
itunes:title: 'Boys and Girl - McVay vs. Garrett; The Chemistry Issue; Week 15 Rams Preview with NFL Network's Omar Ruiz
description:
On today’s episode of the 'Boys and Girl Podcast, Jane and Bobby discuss how chemistry issues may be to blame for the Cowboys struggles this season. Also, NFL Network’s Omar Ruiz stops by to preview this Sunday’s game against the Rams. Follow Jane and Bobby on Twitter and subscribe to get all the latest inside information from two of the most connected people in the Cowboys’ community.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
